casebody.data:
No. 10-74. Javier Rivera Aquino, Secretary, Puerto Rico Department of Agriculture, et al., Petitioners v. Suiza Dairy, Inc., et al. 562 U.S. 959, 131 S. Ct. 498,

178 L. Ed. 2d 285,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7945. October 12, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
